description: Try our easy to follow Southern-Style Bbq Pork Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: SouthernStyle Bbq Pork Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large green apple, cored, cut into matchsticks
400g bottles buttermilk pancake shaker, fat trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over high heat. Cook pork for 12 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Remove from pan.

Add onion to same pan. Cook over medium heat for 5 minutes or until softened. Stir in paprika and cook for 1 minute. Stir in passata and barbecue sauce. Return pork to pan, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove pork and thinly slice. Stir through sauce.
To make the slaw, whisk mayonnaise and vinegar together in a bowl. Toss through cabbage and apple.
Split bread rolls and fill with slaw and pork mixture. Serve.
